reviews.review_text: Golds Gym PoCo is a great gym, I love the layout and the fact that there s a women s only space. Simon was my personal trainer for 3 months and he was the absolute best (I would recommend him a 1000 times. Very professional, funny, very knowledgeable, gets the job done with minimal injury. I experienced amazing increase in strength and fitness within the 3-month period. Everyone is nice and helpful. Loving it!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi, Moji. Thanks for taking the time to share your positive experience. We truly appreciate it! So glad youre crushing your fitness goals and feeling stronger due to your sessions with Simon! Excited to see what you can accomplish next with him!  - Golds Gym Port Coquitlam Team.

reviews.review_text: I was blown away by the customer service I received when I first came in with my sister as a guest. Cole showed us around the entire gym letting us know what Golds gym had to offer in PoCo. From the welcoming community to the outstanding customer service, the gym had everything I needed to do my full week workout rotation. Something not many gyms I ve been to have. 5/5 would recommend asking for Cole for the tour!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi, Winston. Thank you for taking the time to post a review! We are happy to hear you enjoyed your experience at Golds Gym Port Coquitlam. Our goal is always to exceed your expectations! If there s anything we can help you with, please don t hesitate to let us know. We hope to see you again soon, Golds Gym Port Coquitlam Team.

reviews.review_text: Gold s is always good, but the staff here are great. Always good vibes. Paolo gave me so much helpful information to help me with my fitness goals. Highly recommend.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi, Feria. Thanks for taking the time to share your positive experience. We truly appreciate it! - Golds Gym Port Coquitlam Team.

reviews.review_text: I m going to Gold s gym for a long time like four years. There s a lot of useful equipment you may use   The crews are very nice and the equipments are well maintained. If you dont know how to use them you may ask the trainers. I recommend this gym to anyone who cares about health and wellness.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi, Behzad. Thanks for the review! We appreciate the kind words and are glad we could provide you with a positive fitness experience at Golds Gym Port Coquitlam. Kindly, Golds Gym Port Coquitlam Team.

reviews.review_text: I ve been coming here for personal training with Kiefer for about a few weeks now and I ve been very happy with his work. He knows what to work on with me and provides me with tips and feedback so overall I m really happy with this gym.

Great location that is easy to access from the highway. The staff were friendly upon arrival and were happy to show me around. They have a good atmosphere that makes you feel very comfortable. The facilities were new and clean. I can say the same about the equipment. They also have a steam room and an infrared sauna in the change room for after workout. The also have massive TVs if the game is on. I really enjoyed my workout here.

This gym is amazing. There is so much to offer from free weights to Olympic weights and machines you can get any type of workout done here. Also I must say this place is kept up very well and felt very clean. Ruba the manager was a great help getting us set up here and can t wait to get more workouts in at this location.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi, Troy. Thanks for taking the time to share your positive experience. We truly appreciate it!

reviews.review_text: From my first visit I ve felt comfortable here. The facility is clean and the staff are friendly. I had an orientation and fitness assessment with Paolo, it was such a great experience that I booked personal training sessions with Paolo. He has been a great help on my weight loss journey.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi, Brad. Thanks for taking the time to share your positive experience. We truly appreciate it! - Golds Gym Port Coquitlam Team.

reviews.review_text: This is by far the best gym in the area. I joined in January and have been training with Lucas, who is one of the personal trainers. Lucas is a very knowledgeable and effective personal trainer, who has helped me shape up and gain strength. His training techniques are highly effective and results-oriented. He practices what he preaches and motivates you with his positive demeanour. I highly recommend him. The local management team is also great, as they are always willing to help and motivate you. Always good vibes.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi, Omar. Thank you so much for leaving us a positive review! It means so much to us. We hope to continue bringing value to your fitness experience. - Golds Gym Port Coquitlam Team.

reviews.review_text: Love the PoCo gold s gym.  Gym is always clean and staff are very friendly.  Gym equipment are state of the art.  Paolo is always happy, fun accommodating whenever we see him.  Been training with Erica for 6 months, great trainer, she s very knowledgeable, tough but you can feel every muscle working!!! Highly recommend.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for your kind words, Chitojen. We really appreciate you taking the time to share your positive experience with us. Warmly, Golds Gym Port Coquitlam Team.

reviews.review_text: Really great experience at golds. Has lots of space and wide variety of machines to get a good workout in. They also offer alot of additional amenities so youll definitely have some bang for bucks.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Travez! Thank you for your review. We do all we can to provide our members with the best experience at our clubs. It always makes our day when someone goes the extra mile to show their appreciation. We hope to make your next visit just as positive. Have a great day! Golds Gym Port Coquitlam Team.

reviews.review_text: The gym is good. Also, my personal trainer is Kourosh, he is the best trainer you could possibly work with, he is so patient and spends a lot of time to make sure you are reaching your body goals! Thanks Kourosh!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi, Masoud. Thank you for taking the time to post a review! We are happy to hear you enjoyed your experience at Golds Gym Port Coquitlam. Our goal is always to exceed your expectations! If there s anything we can help you with, please don t hesitate to let us know. We hope to see you again soon, Golds Gym Port Coquitlam Team.

reviews.review_text: Hi golds gym manager it Carly I just wanted to say I have been getting the best treatment at gym from Michael on front desk and Anna. They have been so wonderful and kind. Thank you for hiring such good staff. They really go out of their way to help. Ruba and Christina make wonderful managers.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi, Carly. Thanks for taking the time to share your positive experience. We truly appreciate it! - Golds Gym Port Coquitlam Team.

reviews.review_text: I got guilted, in the best way possible, to come back to the gym..Ruba was so sweet and so convincing i couldnt say no to returning .The staff are all amazing.. Paolo makes me laugh and I always feel good about coming into the gym.  My trainer Maria, she is golden.. she knows exactly what i am looking for and has pushed my limits in the best ways.. she is knowledgeable and patient..and explains each exercise.. the whys and the hows.. I know i am reaching my goals working with Maria.. thank you beautiful lady.... Thanks to everyone at this Golds Gym.. you are all amazing..
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi, Rhonda. Thank you so much for leaving us such a positive review! It means so much to us. We hope to continue bringing value to your fitness experience. We appreciate you Rhonda  - Golds Gym Port Coquitlam Team.

reviews.review_text: Gold s gym in Port Coquitlam was amazing!  The manager Ruba was super friendly, energetic and personable.  I m from out of town and was very impressed.  Also loved the atmosphere.  Thanks Gold s gym!!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi, Hayley. Thanks for taking the time to share your positive experience. We truly appreciate it!  - Golds Gym Port Coquitlam Team.

reviews.review_text: Golds gym has super friendly staff and a well kept environment. Only a month in and I ve never felt more welcome. If you re looking to get some personal training: Harini is your person. She s patient, thorough and passionate about what she does. My goals were well-supported and structured to fit my needs. Each session Harini showed up excited and always encouraged me to ask questions. I ve learned lots and have moved forward in my journey with thanks to the funniest PT (Harini)!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi, A. Thank you for taking the time to post a review! We are happy to hear you enjoyed your experience at Golds Gym Port Coquitlam. Our goal is always to exceed your expectations! If there s anything we can help you with, please don t hesitate to let us know. We hope to see you again soon, Golds Gym Port Coquitlam Team.

reviews.review_text: The gym is very big and clean. The staff and members are very friendly and nice. There is a lot of good equipment here aswell. Can t wait to come back!!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi, Amy. Thank you so much for leaving us a positive review! It means so much to us. We hope to continue bringing value to your fitness experience. - Golds Gym Port Coquitlam Team.

reviews.review_text: My first experience with weight lifting and personal training was amazing in this place. Ruba and her positive energy encouraged me to give it a try, and then Pauli matched me with Herini(I m not sure how it s spelled)Herini was accurate, friendly, punctual and very professional. My first goal was having strength and energy, which I could feel from first session, then all my pains were gone too, that was my next priority, I feel great now and recommend this place and Herini for anyone who is looking for a modern equipped gym with professional trainer as Herini    Thank you Gold gym team
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi, Azi. Thank you so much for leaving us a positive review! It means so much to us. So glad youre crushing your workouts with Harini, really proud of you for taking those first steps and following through! We hope to continue bringing value to your fitness experience. - Golds Gym Port Coquitlam Team.

reviews.review_text: I have been enjoying this Gym so far. I thoroughly recommend this Gym to anyone in the area. Why? 1) The administration team is professional and supportive, according to your needs and goals. Paolo is professional and encouraging, and Ruba and Christiana are lovely and supportive people as well. 2) I have personal training sessions with Erica and Sky; they are knowledgeable and great trainers for achieving your goals. All in all, you should be part of this beautiful and positive Gym community. God Bless you all.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Marriioo! Thank you so much for taking the time to share your experience! Youre such a ray of sunshine whenever youre here! We appreciate you! :)

reviews.review_text: Great place with good personal trainers. If you need a good push to your new life change journey, Maria is your person. She is helpful and understands your needs. She takes time to teach you to understand your body and all the machines that you can find in the gym. Selective machines, clean space. The gym is a bit busy sometimes, but the gym community is good and patient.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hey Dorisz thank you so much for sharing your experience with Maria , we agree shes amazing! Keep crushing those workouts, we appreciate you! :)

reviews.review_text: Great ambience and positive vibe, worth the money.  Getting the best fitness experience ever since joined Gold Gym.  Highly recommended for anyone.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi, Mark. Thanks for taking the time to share your positive experience. We truly appreciate it! - Golds Gym Port Coquitlam Team.

reviews.review_text: I have recently rejoined Golds Gym Port Coquitlam after over 4 years of not much exercise. I was concerned how I would be viewed as I have gained a lot of weight since the break from gym due to my accident.  I was putting off joining gym again as I was embarrassed about how I now looked. I set up an appointment with Ruba to find out about joining again.  Ruba was super friendly, knowledgeable, and so kind.  I was put at ease as there was no judgement.  While there I saw a lot of other members of staff who remembered and greeted me.  They were super kind.  Ruba then made an appointment for my free personal training session with Paolo. As soon as I met Paolo I knew that he would be very helpful in my path to getting back to the way I was before the accident.  He is very patient, kind and explains what each exercise benefits are in a fun way.  He also adjusted each exercise according to my mobility limitations. I feel positive I will get to my goal of how I was before the accident. I am truly grateful to Golds for putting me back on track.  Even though it might take a while.  I am motivated by Paolo and I am trying hard to get there again. I really appreciate all the kindness and positive encouragement I have been given.  I will work till I achieve my goal of getting back to how I was before.  Happy, Healthy, and Strong. Thank you so much for your help with my journey. Carolyn Liebenberg The attached picture is how I looked before the accident, and it is my goal to get back there again.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi, Carolyn. We re so happy to hear you had a great experience at Golds Gym Port Coquitlam. Your review made our day. Our team works very hard to keep our members happy, but we can only do it thanks to amazing ones like you! We hope we can keep assisting in the process of reaching your fitness goals. Thank you, Golds Gym Port Coquitlam Team.

reviews.review_text: Ruba is an excellent General Manager, extremely friendly and knowledgeable about the gym. didn t push for a membership but was helpful when we signed up  . gym is extremely clean and modern gym equipment, not too busy when i went either
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for your kind words, Sheriden. We really appreciate you taking the time to share your positive experience with us.  Golds Gym Port Coquitlam Team.

reviews.review_text: My experience in this branch is much better and I m having personal training sessions with Koroush and he is a great trainer and truly committed. I already can see my progress.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi, Pejman. Thanks for taking the time to share your positive experience. We are glad you are crushing your workouts with Koroush!!! - Golds Gym Port Coquitlam Team.

reviews.review_text: I have been doing personal training with Sky for the last four months.  Excellent trainer and facility, very happy with my experience so far.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi, Jay. Thanks for taking the time to share your positive experience! We are so glad youre enjoying your sessions with Sky!!!  - Golds Gym Port Coquitlam Team.

reviews.review_text: Recently started going to this gym and was offered a free personal training orientation by one of the newest members Harini. She was extremely cheerful and informative! I learned a lot from her even in just the one hour session.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi, Bob. Thanks for taking the time to share your positive experience. We truly appreciate it! - Golds Gym Port Coquitlam Team.

reviews.review_text: This is definitely my favourite gym that I have been to so far! It is an exceptional facility that exceeds expectations on all levels. Cole is a great face to see when you walk in, and has always been super helpful. If you are looking for a gym in poco, this should be it.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi, Wyatt. Thanks for taking the time to share your positive experience. We truly appreciate it!

reviews.review_text: Looking forward to working out again at Gold s Gym in Poco. Ruba, and her staff have been so amazing to deal with. First class service!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi, Matt. Thank you so much for leaving us a positive review! It means so much to us. We hope to continue bringing value to your fitness experience. - Golds Gym Port Coquitlam Team.

reviews.review_text: This is the first gym I ve ever been to. The environment is great, I ve met a lot of awesome people. Paolo & Aruba we re very welcoming and helped me take that first leap into the life of fitness. Paolo s training has been the only thing that has taken me out of a muscle building plateau, and helped me learn the ins and outs of training properly.

Fantastic....I just have the limited membership for the smaller upstairs gym. Today was my first day just did cardio. Super busy week so will go again tomorrow morning to get another round of cardio. This is the perfect membership for me. August 2023 For the past year I have been using Maria as my personal trainer once a week. I am getting fantastic  results. My chest is 1.5 inches bigger waist 1.5 inches smaller and increase overall muscle dramatically while reducing body fat. I love you guys at Golds
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi, Frank. Thank you so much for leaving us a positive review! It means so much to us. So proud of what youre achieving with Marias help! Keep killing it! - Golds Gym Port Coquitlam Team.

reviews.review_text: Great facility, top notch equipment and plenty of it. I never have to stand around waiting to use a squat rack. People are generally helpful and friendly if you re a newbie to the gym.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi, Michelle. Thanks for taking the time to share your positive experience. We truly appreciate it! - Golds Gym Port Coquitlam Team.

reviews.review_text: Ive been working out with personal trainer Nicole Wong at Golds poco for over a year now and if you are looking for the very best trainer for your fitness journey look no further. She has motivated me to reach my highest potential. She is extremely knowledgeable and I could not ask for a better trainer.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hey Victoria, Im glad youre enjoying your training sessions, Nicole is awesome!

reviews.review_text: I love this gym. It is my go to gym always! I have trained here with Erica, she is AMAZING!!! So knowledgeable, full of passion and she gives the best stretches after each exercise. I have trained with others before in other gyms as well and I have never been more happy than when I trained with Erica. I learned so much from her, I can t say enough. She is a true professional trainer, the best in all of Vancouver!!!!!! Thank you Erica for your passion, your professionalism, your kindness and for being just genuine to help me learn about fitness! You are the best! I recommend golds gym because of Erica!
Lucas is hands down the best trainer, he s worth his weight in gold. Unless you re not looking for results, request him.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi, Damion. Thanks for the review! Glad youre crushing your workouts with Lucas!!!! Keep killing it! - Golds Gym Port Coquitlam Team.

reviews.review_text: A very relaxing and welcoming environment to have a good workout experience. Good equipment, services, and facilities. Thanks
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi, Stephen. Thanks for taking the time to share your positive experience. We truly appreciate it! - Golds Gym Port Coquitlam Team.

reviews.review_text: Too many young kids with cellphones sitting on equipment and management doesnt due anything to reduce...changed to another gym and people are too busy working out to bother with cell phones.This is a failure on the gyms part and they did not reach thier responsibilities,why I cancelled my membership.

I have been coming to golds gym for one year. This Year I decided to inquire about personal training and I met with Paolo. He has helped me have a clear plan in the gym and a purpose for every workout. In the last month the results i have seen have far surpassed the entire first year in the gym! I highly recommend working with a trainer and I recommend Paolo!
I go to all 3 locations and this is the brightest of them all. It s the penthouse gym location. Equipment is always maintained too!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi, Donna. Thank you so much for leaving us a positive review! It means so much to us. We hope to continue bringing value to your fitness experience. - Golds Gym Port Coquitlam Team.

reviews.review_text: Amazing staff. Paolo is always welcoming and encouraging. You don t realize how important good staff is until you try out other facilities that are much less welcoming. I highly recommend!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi, Mark. Thanks for taking the time to share your positive experience. We truly appreciate it! - Golds Gym Port Coquitlam Team.

reviews.review_text: The gym has everything and is still in new condition. Really great personal trainers and friendly staff as well
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi, James. We are so happy you had a great experience with us. Thank you for taking the time to rate us! - Golds Gym Port Coquitlam Team.

reviews.review_text: Best gym to join I ve belonged to other gyms in the past and Gold s Port Coquitlam is a 10 out of 10.  All the staff so welcoming, I feel so comfortable here as a beginner,  it has been such a positive experience and my trainer Maria Porcellato is the best . I am making gains and slowly reaching my goals thanks to her expertise and encouragement.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Heey Shelley, Im glad youre enjoying your training sessions, Maria is amazing! Keep killing it  <3

reviews.review_text: Ruba and the front dest staff have been very helpful and friendly from day 1. It s a great environment and everyone always has a smile on their face.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi, Adel. Thank you so much for leaving us a positive review! It means so much to us. We hope to continue bringing value to your fitness experience. - Golds Gym Port Coquitlam Team.

reviews.review_text: My Experience At Golds Gym Is The Best. Since Signing Up May 2021.The Staff Is Amazing Here I Couldn t Ask For A Better Place To Be . It s Very Clean I Never Have To Wait For Machines. The Community You Want Be In If Your A New Comer Or Even Trying To Find A Place To Train.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi, Leon! Thanks for taking the time to share your positive experience. We truly appreciate you!

reviews.review_text: I love golds in poco! It s clean and well stocked. The staff are always super friendly even at 6am! Highly recommend :)
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi, Megan. Thanks for taking the time to share your positive experience. We truly appreciate it! - Golds Gym Port Coquitlam Team.

reviews.review_text: Finally has a 6am spin class - and it is absolutely the best! Hoping for more early classes to be scheduled.

Nothing bad to say about this gym at all, always a great workout; Has everything you would ever need while not being too cluttered. Staff are all very friendly and willing to help when you have any questions or concerns. Golds has a really nice balance of atmosphere for anyone trying to achieve their goals, whether you are going 2 days a week or 7 days a week youll never feel intimidated by anyone while working out no matter what kind of shape you are in. On the flipside, there will be always someone bigger/stronger/more fit than you to keep you humbled and motivated. Overall a great balance of people/atmosphere. W gym

Nothing but great staff and service every time Im here. The gym itself has a huge variety of equipment to accommodate most peoples goals. The facility is always clean and members generally do their part - racking their weights and wiping down equipment after use. Overall, I enjoy every visit and would recommend this gym to friends and family. Give Roilo a shout at the front desk!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Chris!  It is always a pleasure to see you every morning!

reviews.review_text: Very happy with this gym, I go 5 to 7 days a week usually during busy times and have been coming to Golds Poco for 9 months now. The management and staff are very friendly and I always appreciate their welcoming greetings. The gym is clean, spacious, and has all the machines I need for a great workout! 5 Stars

Highly recommend this gym to anyone! The GM in charge of the facility Joel. Is a great guy! He runs the gym well and is super friendly to all of his staff members. Best of all he s great with the customers,  always willing to give advice or help when needed. He s one of the few people left that really make you feel appreciated and wanting to come back to a gym the next day
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for your feedback, Scott! Happy to hear that you are enjoying your experience so far. Well be sure to let Joel know what you said. Happy lifting

reviews.review_text: After closure of my previous gym , I was introduced to Golds gym . They were very warm , welcoming and made me feel very comfortable. The staff is courteous with a very professional approach. They go out of there way in helping you and accommodating your needs . Their equipment are of top of line . The best is that during this  COVID time they follow all the protocol very diligently and strictly which makes us all feel secure . It is a pleasure working out in this gym . I wish them all the success that they so deserve. Would recommend to all .

I ve been happy at the gym for almost two years. In this time of Covid the cleaning practices, and attitude of other clients toward safety makes me feel safe. I really enjoyed having Erica as my trainer. She worked with my capabilities and was willing to change the focus of our sessions as I realized I wanted a different focus.   The staff at the gym have all been so welcoming, they greet me by name. It s been a very good experience.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the feedback and review, Gail! Happy to hear you are enjoying the environment and personal training here over the years. Well be sure to let Erica know what you said! Glad to have you part of our Golds Gym Port Coquitlam community. Happy lifting

reviews.review_text: I ve had a gold gym member for a few years now . I have to say I only use their classes . Their instructors are amazing Kim and Lisa. They offer many group classes they are all very hard good classes especially the power class( weights class) and Blast class( hard cardio workout). Gold gym have been very flexible with holding your membership during Covid time so I give them credit for that for sure . They also have many promotions and my favourite is offering same price of my membership to my friends ( you can t beat that). My membership is 23 bucks per month. You can t get better deal than that - 24 hours gym workout and including these classes . Great atmosphere when you get in there and love to see all ages taking care of themselves

Love Golds Gym , I feel very safe working out, love the fact that everyone gets a disinfectant spray bottle to take while you use equipment  ,  staff are also spraying down all the equipment regularly. The staff are so kind and helpful, always greeted with a smile  . Good morning by your name , and a have a good day   when I leave  I am Very happy to be a Golds Gym member .

This is a great gym in every aspect. First of all, the staff is very welcoming. Everytime you walk into the gym, the workers greet you very well despite how early or late it is. I ve managed to build bonds with some of them as well. Ruba the general manager for example. I only first saw her about 3-4 months ago but when I started making small talk with her, she gave me super chill vibes and is approachable.  Very kind and makes golds a welcoming place. Now I make sure to say hello to her whenever I can. There s also cole who I can laugh and talk with at the gym. There s also Christina who always asks me how I am when I walk in. She will also remember who you are because she prioritizes customer service. Basically the environment is very friendly because of the staff and members. Anyone who is new to lifting shouldn t be afraid to come work out here. The equipment is also great. Whenever machines need to be fixed, it will be taken care of within 3-5 days. And a very clean and safe place. paolo is good too
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi, Ricky. Thanks for taking the time to share your positive experience. We truly appreciate it!

reviews.review_text: I m really happy to be back at the gym, especially during the pandemic when we need to be taking care of ourselves.  It really gives me an avenue to release stress. The staff at Gold s is always super friendly, even addressing you by name. I feel safe because the staff keeps the facilities clean and the COVID protocols require the customers to also keep everything clean before and after use.  From an equipment standpoint, it has everything I need and more. I m really happy that I chose Gold s as my gym.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the feedback and review, Jason! Happy to hear you are enjoying the environment and feel safe here. Well be sure to let the whole team know what you said! Glad to have you part of our Golds Gym Port Coquitlam community. Happy lifting

reviews.review_text: Great gym and great facility. Nice equipment and good energy. The manager, Ruba, is great and made the sign up process easy

Well managed from the top down. Staff at the front counter are very personable  and extremely friendly. You are greeted as you enter and exit the facility. The gym is well maintained and clean. Finally for Joel, he is fair but firm which speaks to a well run gym.

Great gym always greeted with a smile first thing in the morning. And usually with a laugh. friendly staff. Gym and locker rooms are always clean and well looked after. The PT trainer I been using for almost 2 years is so committed to her clients it is comforting to know that they are into bring you the results your looking for. Love coming to golds, what a great way to start your day.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the feedback and review, Wayne! Happy to hear you are enjoying the environment and personal training here. Glad to have you part of our Golds Gym Port Coquitlam community. Happy lifting

reviews.review_text: Great gym, I have been going there for a few months. The staff are friendly and helpful. The equipment is clean and up to date. The music is good. Im a happy member. 5 Stars!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Jason, thank you for taking the time to write a review!  We appreciate the kind words and your continued support.  See you again soon!

reviews.review_text: Been working out at this gym for 4 months now! Have been very impressed with the friendliness of the staff, and can always find a free machine. When I go it s not too busy and they take their COVID precautions seriously, so I always feel safe. Would highly recommend this gym to others...

Such a great experience of working out here. Thanks for providing us this amazing gym. Nice and friendly employees, trainer and members. Also, thanks for the great customer service, management and their friendly staff.

Best gym Ive been to in Canada. The staff is friendly and so is the manager, Joel. He is always there for any inquiries or problems. The gym is well maintained with good quality equipment. The gym has established COVID protocols that make members feel safe and there is always staff walking around to ensure these protocols.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the feedback and review, Colton! Happy to hear you are enjoying the environment and community here. Well be sure to let Joel and the whole team know what you said! Happy lifting

reviews.review_text: I always thoroughly enjoy working out at this facility. Its got such a great atmosphere and the staff are friendlier and more helpful than at any other gym that Ive been to. Always plenty of weights to choose from and I hardly ever find myself waiting for machines or racks. I really couldnt ask for much more.

This gym has been awesome so far! Tons of nice, new equipment, following all PHO and guidelines, and seamless check in/out system. Nicole is an amazing personal trainer and Im so glad that Im working with her to help jumpstart my fitness again. Shes a pleasure to learn from, and definitely pushes me when I need it. Highly recommend!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the feedback and review, Alyssa! Happy to hear you are enjoying the environment and personal training here. Well be sure to let Nicole know what you said! Glad to have you part of our Golds Gym Port Coquitlam community. Happy lifting

reviews.review_text: Great place for an awesome workout, the Staff at PoCo location are super friendly & helpful. I joined the Gym last August (because of the variety of Group Fitness classes) & it was the best decision ever :) During this pandemic they are very diligence in daily sanitizing the equipment periodically & reminding members to wear their masks & maintain social distance. Come & check it out for yourself,  you wont regret it.

I have been a member since the start up of Golds Poco and over the years I have been impressed with the growth of the gym; Specifically during the pandemic. When I tell people (who go to other gyms) about the protocols they are always impressed and can t believe how much Golds is doing to keep us all safe and keep their doors open. Pandemic aside, the staff and other members are incredible and I look forward to showing up everyday to be part of such a positive and inclusive environment. I highly recommend becoming a member and being part of what Golds has to offer!

Very well equipped and they had an excellent promotion which made it worth switching to Gold s. They have an excellent selection of equipment and it s never too crowded like other gyms I ve been to. The provision of a sanitizer spray bottle to every customer for use is a great touch.
Amazing facility! Very spacious with a lot of great equipment. Staff were very accommodating and informative. 10/10 would check them out!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi, Bailey. Thank you so much for leaving us a positive review! It means so much to us. We hope to continue bringing value to your fitness experience. - Golds Gym Port Coquitlam Team.

reviews.review_text: Gym is fantastic. Staff are even more fantastic, particularly staff at the front counter. For those who have concerns about safety during the pandemic, staff are doing what they can and overall the gym is doing a good job implementing controls to keep people safe. There are always members who do not follow COVID protocols (like wearing their mask around their chin the whole time)  but the staff do their best  to educate  them and correct their bad behaviour.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for your feedback! We will be sure to let the front desk staff know what you said. Happy to be providing you a safe place to workout! Happy Lifting

reviews.review_text: The staff are so friendly and the GM Joel is the best.  The safety protocols in place are top notch.  They keep the safety of their staff and members a top priority!   The equipment is cleaned continually.  I LOVE my Gold s Gym!!!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for your feedback, Kim! Happy to hear youre enjoying your experience so far. Happy lifting

reviews.review_text: The staff are super friendly and extremely knowledgeable. Mahdi made my experience much more welcoming and understood what my goals were. He also regularly gives me tips on the actual gym floor which created a nice relationship between me and the staff for whenever I need anything. Moreover, I would like to mention the attention to detail Mahdi took to ensure that everything that I used was sanitized and that we consistently maintained a safe distance when I am being taught how to use certain equipment. Thank you all!!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the feedback and review, Ahmed! Happy to hear you are enjoying the environment and enjoying the community here. We will be sure to let Mahdi and the entire team know what you said! Happy lifting

reviews.review_text: The facility is first class. Always clean, the equipment is top notch, and the energy is outstanding. Joel and his team (front desk, trainers, cleaning staff, support staff) are always friendly and helpful. Starting the day at Gold s is an integral part of my daily success.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for the kind words, it is a pleasure having you as a member.  See you tomorrow morning!

reviews.review_text: This place is professional, they care about your safety. The equipment is cleaned constantly by staff and after each use by the customer. Golds has every kind of equipment needed to all exercises that are needed. And if you dont know how to use a piece of equipment the staff is more than knowledgeable on how the equipment should be used. If you dont want to ask the staff just watch others that use the equipment and you learn very quickly. And the best way to learn how to do anything is just do it.

I been going to this gym since it opened back in 2016, the staff are friendly and accommodating. Their Covid protocols are above and beyond than any other gym I looked into... very big space never crowded... the managers are prompt with any problem that comes up.. the equipment is always clean and working... I ve been to numerous gyms over the years and hands down my favourite I been lifting for 20+ years..
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for your feedback and review! We are happy to hear that you are enjoying your experience with us so far and have been enjoying the equipment and space. We will be sure to let the entire team know what you said! Happy lifting

reviews.review_text: We have been members for over 3 years.  We have no complaints, staff is great, gym is well kept and during covid we have felt safe following all guidelines required.  Plenty of space and a wide variety of equipments.  Highly recommend!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Super happy Milly, its an honour to have you at our Golds gym Coquitlam location!  Were proud to be Coquitlams top gym.

reviews.review_text: Ruba made me feel so comfortable joining Golds and everyone is friendly and welcoming. I am enjoying the top-notch equipment, womens space, and yoga classes as well! Thank you!

I have been a member since Golds Poco has opened and was super impressed back then and even more now since COVID. The staff is so amazing, they are always making sure everyone is happy and safe. I am always so impressed with the cleanliness during my workouts and that there is always someone waving and saying hi to make me feel at home. There is no reason to not absolutely love this gym!!!

Its been six months since I came here. This place has pretty good facility and trainners (especially ,Mathew) He makes me feel good whenever i go there ,which is getting stronger and refresher on my body. He is professional, friendly and always willing to help you out if you need it. I strongly recommend a personal trainer,Mathew. I really like gold gym

Great overall experience!! Everyone is really friendly and willing to help. Joel as a GM is always there to help, Jean is just a wealth of information to help you with your diet, and motivation. If you need a trainer to get you to your goal Nicole Wong I would have to say is one of the best she will definitely get the most out of you. I would definitely recommend Golds Gym Poco to anyone!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the feedback and review, Steve! Happy to hear you are enjoying the environment and community. We will be sure to let Joel, Jean, Nicole and the entire team know what you said! Happy lifting

reviews.review_text: Been going to this gym since it opened and I love it there. Good equipment, tons of classes if thats what your into, and they offer free boot camps on Saturdays which is always fun and a good way to challenge yourself. The staff are really friendly and helpful especially Sam who always makes me feel welcome the minute I walk in the door. The trainers are really good too. Ive been training with Paolo for just over a month now and the amount of progress & improvement I have seen in myself is unbelievable. Hes helped me a lot to improve my fitness level and I dont think my gym performance would be anywhere near where it is today without him. Plus he makes workouts fun and not boring. Overall this gym is great and has tons to offer.

I ve been going to this gym since September after Steve Nash Fitness Clubs closed and rebranded. The Gold s staff is super welcoming and friendly and the gym is super clean! Their covid protocol has been amazing. I feel very safe going to the gym during this pandemic.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the feedback and review, Trish! Happy to hear you are enjoying the environment, we will be sure to let the whole team know what you said! Glad to have you part of our Golds Gym Port Coquitlam community. Happy lifting

reviews.review_text: Been at Golds Gym Poco for almost a year, and have loved it! The staff is amazing, especially front desk! Very clean, making me feel safe during the pandemic! I would definitely recommend to anyone!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Kasia, we love being your top Coquitlam gym!

reviews.review_text: I have been a member at Golds Gym Poco since the start. I have had nothing but a positive experience at this gym the staff and owners are extremely friendly and personable. Up until recent with the surge of COVID there has been some stigma around safety at gyms and I would have to say this Poco golds gym is very cautious and careful around safety protocol and making sure to implement all safety measures to make not only the members feel safe but the staff as well. I really love coming to golds gym and will continue to be a long term member for the foreseeable future.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the feedback and review, Kevin! We are happy to have you as a valued member over the years. We are glad that you continue enjoy the environment and community here. Happy lifting

reviews.review_text: I have a experience  PT program  at Port Coquitlam Gold  Gym with Erica. She is super outstanding professional trainer. Erica  gives me detailed instructions on the custom exercise for me. Her training is including whole parts of my  body exercises so each exercise is very helpful for my body making. Program is perfectly fit for my body weight , height and age. She also teaches me how to prevent injuries during the weight training. She teaches  me how to stretch each body part. Program is really outstanding - lots of details to right postures, right weight selections, chair height, bar positions and so much more. Highly recommend.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the feedback and review, Mona! Happy to hear you are enjoying the environment and personal training here. Well be sure to let Erica know what you said! Glad to have you part of our Golds Gym Port Coquitlam community. Happy lifting

reviews.review_text: Great friendly staff. They do a good job always sanitizing the equipment and making sure everybody is safe and healthy. Shout out to the staff member! Oh and they have the best smoothie makers in Greater Vancouver in my opinion ;)
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Great! Happy to be your top Coquitlam gym!

reviews.review_text: Great gym always clean and so much equipment never any waiting. Pick the right time of day no crowds and out in 90 minutes. Staff always friendly especially front desk staff...
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for taking the time to write a review, we appreciate your support!  Always a pleasure to see you :)

reviews.review_text: The cleanest and most Covid friendly gym I have been too. Everyone wipes down there machines after use. everyone gets there own spray bottle that is sanitized before use. Golds is a 5 star gym!

She s Awesome!!! I trained almost a year with her. She has all the knowledge of the workout and is very polite and friendly. Thanks to her, my body has been strengthened with muscles in my whole life and has never been this healthy. She is perfect Personal trainer. I am very proud that she is my trainer.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the feedback and review, Elisa! Happy to hear you are enjoying the environment and personal training here. Happy lifting

reviews.review_text: Will always be my favourite gym! Spacious, good well maintained equipment! Only complaint is that it gets way to busy but that s like any gym
Golds is a fabulous gym and Ruba was so welcoming and kind - would highly recommend this location
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi, Ida. Thanks for taking the time to share your positive experience. We truly appreciate it! - Golds Gym Port Coquitlam Team.

reviews.review_text: Cleanest gym I have been to.  Only 75 people MAX in a large space.  You get your own sanitized water bottle upon entry.  Someone there to check your temperature and monitor.  5 stars for sure
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for your feedback! We are happy to hear you re enjoying your experience with us! Happy Lifting

reviews.review_text: The facility is very clean. The staff do not turn over. Staff take the time to get to know you in a socially appropriate manor. You are always made to feel like you belong there. The facility communicates verbally, through signage, and with online emails, and webpages. COVID precautions were followed diligently. After a year of membership, interrupted by COVID, I decided to retain the assistance of a personal trainer with some mobility and fitness issues. Erica Lee was chosen based on my spouse s experience helping her with her fitness and mobility issues. We are 69 and 70 years old otherwise very fit for our age. Erica, through a painful supervised and assisted exercise routine has dramatically improved my mobility to do my ordinary activities of daily living. Having lots of strength and cardio exercise capacity does not work well if movement is painful or restricted. She has improved the quality of my life in ways I could not do for myself. Erica supervises  and assists my workout twice a week. My plan is continue this program with Erica indefinitely.. thank you Golds Gym

I ve always had a problem working out in gyms because often i d get uncomfortable in the all gender section. At golds this is not the case, the staff and members are all super respectful of everyone around them. Not once have i felt uncomfortable at this gym.

Golds has done an exceptional job of complying with the Provincial Health regulations. The gym is always spotless and they have implemented additional cleaning measures to keep it s members as safe as possible. My wife, daughter and I appreciate the effort that goes into maintaining this standard. Thank you Golds!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for your feedback! Happy to hear youre enjoying your experience so far, happy lifting

reviews.review_text: Love the gym! Paolo & Ruba are awesome and make the experience that much better. Highly recommend this gym
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hey Carm! Appreciate you taking the time to share your experience! :)

reviews.review_text: Pretty solid gym. The place is kept pretty clean, the staff is all really nice. Core Culture being downstairs is very convenient for people in need of any supplements or even a post workout shake. It s like an all in one.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for the feedback and review, Jackson! Happy to hear that you are enjoying both the gym facility and Core Culture! Happy lifting

reviews.review_text: Wonderful family owned business. They are very successful in giving the full experience to their Gym members and their staff. We have been at this location and the staff are so friendly which is a great sign of positive leadership and ownership. Best Gym in PoCo by far.
Awesome gym! Been coming here for 2 years now and it s been a great experience. Great equipment, the gym itself is massive and the staff are wicked. Would recommend to anyone and everyone
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the feedback and review, Darren! Happy to hear you are enjoying the environment and well be sure to let the team know what you said! Glad to have you part of our Golds Gym Port Coquitlam community. Happy lifting

reviews.review_text: This is a very well run and organized gym.  The facilities are clean and spacious.  The manager Joel and his staff are friendly and accommodating.  I highly recommend this gym to anyone interested in personal fitness at a top notch gym.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for the feedback, Jim! Well be sure to let Joel and the team know what you said. Happy lifting!

reviews.review_text: Paolo demonstrated outstanding service in our discussions. He is extremely knowledgeable about training programs and recommended the right plan for me. Highly recommend Paolo to anyone in need of a personal training program!
